website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-use hidden camera that can be attached with its built-in magnet. Good image quality and reasonably reliable smart capabilities.
pros: Has WiFi connectivity, rechargeable battery, and motion sensor
Stores images through the app or on an SD card
Works fairly well in low-light situations
Owners love the wide-angle images it produces
cons: Rare reports of batteries that don't hold a charge
May have difficulty pairing with some  iPhones

customer_reviews.title: Decent for what it needs to do
customer_reviews.text: It's small enough to set and forget it on many different surfaces with the included accessories. I showcase the unboxing, setup and quality in the video. Battery could be better, but then again it's small so you should expect the time to record with wireless display on for about an hour. You can recording while charging so you can technically record for as long as you want.
customer_reviews.author: iBertz

customer_reviews.title: Be patient with linking all. Took me several tries. Works fine afterwards.
customer_reviews.text: I like the camera. It is not difficult to set up. Read instructions carefully. Download APP. In order to have camera to work using wifi and iphone, you need to chose your home/work wifi, pair it with iphone. Enter your wifi password. Must press ok or will not save any info. It took me several tries to link all together, but it does work. I am able to see real time video leaving cam at home and viewing at work 20 miles away using my iphone.. Very cool.. You can record if you like or take snap shots. Take your time reading instructions carefully...
customer_reviews.author: Rubin Melendez

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Iphone
customer_reviews.text: Try everything with my iphone and it does not work at all, it makes the connection and the image is white and I called the company and they never answered me ...
customer_reviews.author: George Migliarini

customer_reviews.title: It works well, provided all you need is surveillance footage
customer_reviews.text: I had my hopes a bit too high with this product, so be aware that the image quality is specifically suited for Surveillance purposes, and you should not expect outstanding image clarity. The IR lights for the night vision have a pretty low range so if you're working with complete darkness, you would probably want to add some additional IR Lighting. For a sub $100 camera that works for discrete surveillance, this camera is compact, gets the job done and is easy to use once you've set it up on wifi.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Best value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what is advertised, great little cam. I have it hooked to my android phone so I can monitor it away from home. I also connected it to my IPAD, there was a problem at first with the app they suggested for IOS devices, but after contacting AREBI support, they gave me a different app suggestion, and it worked perfectly. I also had a couple of questions about charging and the frequency option, and their quick response was very appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: J C Stedman

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product
customer_reviews.text: This camera is absolutely NOT worth it. It worked for 1 day before the battery died. I charged it and put it back in the same spot and it hasn't worked since. I uninstalled and reinstalled the app several times all I get is a white screen. Save your money and buy a better camera, cheaper is not always better. I'm learning that the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: D. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Best little wifi camera i have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I went into this purchase not expecting a whole lot but was very early on surprised by the quality and ease of use. The latency through wifi is really good and easy to set up. The video quality is really good very surprising for such a small camera and better than anything close to its size. Its also cheaper than any other competition of the same quality. I have also been using it in a wet environment for the last 4 months and it works without a hitch. i would highly recommend this product to anyone and regularly do.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Camera does not work properly
customer_reviews.text: I bought the camera, and i am having trouble getting support. the camera does not work. It shows a white screen without any video at all.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Dislike
customer_reviews.text: Video is so blurry and night vision is so dark ain’t look like 1080.
customer_reviews.author: JLac

customer_reviews.title: A great way to be discreet when monitoring your home!
customer_reviews.text: I love the size , shape , look of this camera here so much because I can stick it on all kinds of places and it doesn't look obvious that it's a camera. I have put these in 2 of my home offices and I'm starting to incorporate them into the bedrooms so can monitor the children as well. They work very nicely and connecting them to everything was easier than I thought. Great product! Gets an A+ from me!
customer_reviews.author: Devin de

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Would not connect to WiFi and wonky. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't make a good connection so in other words it DOESN'T work
customer_reviews.text: Keeps disconnecting. Should have stopped when I say the black Chinese box it came in. It looks all professional in the ad but this is so cheaply made and I have to use an app which I don't trust. My money back please.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Too many flaws
customer_reviews.text: This would be a great device if the battery didn't die fast and it didnt constantly disconnect from the home wifi network. I've had to reset it 3 times in one day. It's beautifully designed, discreet, and a good concept. However, I'm sending it back since I need a fully functional home surveillance camera.
customer_reviews.author: E Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome small wifi camera
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. Its video quality is excellent for its size and its wide angle lens is also very impressive. Can be controlled using mobile anywhere and you can see the video from your mobile/laptop. So it is very handy as I am using in room and I also notice that is is very effective as a dash-cam in car as well. So overall very happy with the purchase..
customer_reviews.author: Customer12

customer_reviews.title: The battery is garbage!
customer_reviews.text: Battery lasts MAYBE a couple hours and dies, the picture is not great in the first place but somehow the battery drains it's self so quick that on its third day I opened the app to take a look just 1 HOUR after taking it off the charger w/ Cam 100% and it was already dead again.... Terrible Waste!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hargis

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like that the battery life on the camera only lasts like an hours if you leave it unplugged...but the picture is awesome, very clean images and the motion detection is great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Complicated
customer_reviews.text: OK, got Windows PC....Arebi sent link to download PCTools......downloaded....files compressed....so naturally had to uncompress....my PC replied: "not sufficient memory". Have 1T hard drive....loads of space....16gb Ram.....so that's not it. In addition, camera won't function by itself. Mode button = reset; On/off button doesn't stop the camera - when charged- green light kept blinking to connect.. but never connected as per PCTools. Next day, my computer was laggy at start; I decided PCTools may not be best for PC. I figured even if it actually records video without app....I would not get the date/time stamp accurate. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Two Cents

customer_reviews.title: UPSET
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT WORK WHEN YOU LEAVE YOUR HOME AFTER YOU SET UP THE APP. Called support said I had to be home to fix it. But how would I know if its fixed if it only opens when I am at home. this is beyond pointless!. Extremely upset, and want my $50. BACK!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great tiny wifi camera
customer_reviews.text: I've had problems with other small wifi cameras not staying connected and working but not this one. This one is fairly discrete and stays connected to the wifi very well. I love too that it has a wide angle lens that covers more area.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Gee

customer_reviews.title: Bad pic and won't save to sd card
customer_reviews.text: When not in night vision mode, as the unit gets warm, the picture takes on a pinkish color. When in night vision mode, picture is clear, when it works. I spent too much time trying to get this camera to work. You get what you pay for and this product is cheap. I will be returning this and purchase Nest cam like friends told me to get. Won't save to the sd card even after formatting it several times.
customer_reviews.author: David Pfaff

customer_reviews.title: OK unit, awful WiFi functionality
customer_reviews.text: The camera is decent. Other reviews cover those features. The reason I am returning this and giving it a low rating is the wifi functionality. I should say the lack thereof. Even being in the same room with my Nighthawk router (which my phone can pick up outside on the other side of the house, with many internal walls, a brick external wall, a giant metal shelving unit in the garage, and a garage door... router power is not an issue) about 3 out of 4 times I check the camera it says "request service." A monitoring device that only works 25% of the time is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: kenny

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this a 4 overall because of a couple things. The battery life is awful, so I've had to keep it constantly plugged in which limits where i can put it. And the other reason is that to record, you must be in the app actively watching, which pretty much defeats the purpose of a hidden camera(in terms of catching what happens when you aren't in app) Besides that, video, pic, sound and IR quality are amazing for this price of camera. It works well for the job, but would be nice if it would record continuously
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Poor night vision
customer_reviews.text: Work fine in light area but night vision is poor
customer_reviews.author: Regina Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Looks well built but app doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This camera looks and feels solidly built. Unfortunately the app isn't as well done. It won't connect to my phone through wifi, severely limiting the functunality. I was going to return it, even printed the label, but since I got this camera at a bargain price ($30) on a lightning sale I decided to keep it. It does record to the sd card even though I can't view the live feed on my phone. And the magnetic base is convenient. I am now looking for a camera, like this one, but with controls on the camera itself instead of relying on wireless control through your phone. The video quality is ok but colors on the video aren't very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Bert Mayoli

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is very high quality. It was very easy to set up using the app I downloaded to my phone. The video is high quality. You can use the magnet to attach the camera to your front door to use as a video doorbell as well. I appreciate the lightning deal I got on this as it was close to 1/2 the price listed now. I haven't been able to get the night vision to work but everything else is top notch & I didn't get this for teh night vision anyway.
customer_reviews.author: R. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: battery sucks
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 2 stars solely because it has to be plugged in to power for it to have any real purpose. Plugging it in makes it less of a hidden spy cam. I use it on motion sensor to see if my dog goes on the sofa while I'm not home. I didn't expect to have to plug it in, but it shuts itself off after a few minutes otherwise. If you don't mind plugging it in, the picture quality is great as is the motion detection.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Will not connect via wifi
customer_reviews.text: The camera was recognized by my phone (wifi) for about a minute when initially turned on, now after several terrible shooting steps the camera still cannot be recognized. It's useless. I have yet to see the camera function.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Only works with WiFi pretty much
customer_reviews.text: This camera needs to be connected to WiFi if not you need to be within about 5ft of camera to view live stream I’ve been testing it and it’s a little disappointing and even when I’ve been close it disconnects and just says requests service or logging in and i can’t use it until I turn it off and on or reboot it. So quick update I am loving the camera when connected to my home network it does what it’s supposed to and the customer service is great the company really does care about the product they put out and try their best to resolve any issues you have
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Support.
customer_reviews.text: I can not, yet, review the camera's function as I just got it. I will add more as I test the equipment. I can, however, say that I am VERY impressed with Customer Support. I have tried, used, broken, returned and failed to connect many cameras of this type in the last months. Chinglish instructions were impossible to understand, customer support was non-existent. THIS TIME; Alyssa at AIRBI was/is fantastic. I'm not getting paid or freebies or discounts to say this. I'm writing this to anyone who's skittish about purchasing products like this. For the first time ever, may I say Buy with "Confidence".
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Korotev

customer_reviews.title: Small, discreet
customer_reviews.text: Initially setting up the link between camera and apps didn’t go well. The best app clearly is the iOS version. I haven’t been successful linking with the Android app to-date. Picture quality is very good. One time I left the camera running in my kitchen to see what my pets were up to; tried to link with camera from work via internet/WiFi, but only received a message saying the camera was offline. For an unknown reason the camera shut off after about 20 minutes. For short durations the camera is excellent. I’m still trying to create a successful long “viewing” experience. For the price the camera does most of what the creators say it will do.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money app sucks saying reboot when your off wifi cant watch while your not home or off your wifi connection but it says you can it lied ordered two different cameras both work off the same app dont be fooled if your not on the app 24/7 cant record at all i don’t understand what the purpose ofthis camera dont waste your money and time because it cud b a real important reason you need this thing to work and it dont but tou get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: user0523

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: This camera is extremely easy to mount and set up. I should have ordered a micro SD card however, I've been able to record or capture images from my phone. I realized the other day that if you set it to record on your phone and close the app window (not the app completely) it will quit recording. I would like to see an update that will allow you to record when minimizing the app. I'm sure with a micro SD card this probably would not be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little gadget
customer_reviews.text: The app is a little tricky but if you contact them via email they will send you step by step instructions. The camera great and i was able to see the entire room.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: A whole lot in a little package!
customer_reviews.text: I've never owned a spy cam before. I initially bought one for surveillance not knowing what it would be like. I am blown away with how much technology is packed into this little device. The HD picture is great and of course the ability to remote monitor my home. I love how I can adjust the motion sensitivity (great for pets). I also have the flexibility to insert a micros SD for longer recording time and there are a number of mounting options. I now have several of these and have made my own surveillance network for my home so I don't have to pay the high fees of a monitoring company.
customer_reviews.author: Gary M.

customer_reviews.title: I DON'T RECOMMEND THIS CHEAP ITEM
customer_reviews.text: The camera comes on fine. However it only stays connected about 20mins or so, then the camera drops the connection. I've tried turning off/no, and again and RESETTING to Wifi. Again, it comes on fine, but then drops the connection after 20mins. Don't expect it to offer live streaming, because it drops the connection. And the MOTION DETECTION doesn't work properly either. Frustrating, and not worth your money. Amazon really needs to vet out its sellers/retailers. These are very costly mistakes in money and reputation, made by a company who can afford to do a lot better then this.
customer_reviews.author: Southern+Soul

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tech
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup. P2P app. I setup at home on wifi to pair to my phone. Tested it in my workplace. Haven't tried the sd card recording capability. Used my phone as the record device. Had to leave my phone on with the display active. Picture quality was great. I used it for a total of 30 minutes and charge was still decent. Just power on the device and the phone logs into it. Pop the camera to some magnetic surface and done. tap the phone screen and push the record icon. Very simple.
customer_reviews.author: Todd P. Mailen

customer_reviews.title: Did work but is broken after 2 hours of testing
customer_reviews.text: The camera works except out of the box the SD card slot is broken. I'm very disappointed because my purpose for buying it included using a SD card. Only 2 stars for a broken product. Scratch that. The camera no longer turns on. It's completely useless. Update: I reached out to the seller and they were very prompt to respond and help me attempt to fix the issues with the camera. After attempting the things they suggested we determined that the device was defective and they sent me a new camera for free. The new does exactly what its supposed to do and so far I am very pleased with this little camera.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron C

customer_reviews.title: Nice cams,
customer_reviews.text: The picture is very good. Night vision of course is a bit harder. Has a purple cast to it but you can still get a pretty decent picture. The setup is relatively easy but for some reason, I had trouble connecting them to my network. Operator error is the problem. The seller contacted me through email and actually sent me screenshots of each step. Yeah, I had a bit of trouble but they won’t let hang in the wind. Pretty good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I really like these cameras but I ran into problems later down the line and the cameras would not let me see them unless I was directly connect to my houses wifi. After man countless tires to fix it I gave up and tried to connect to the customer service. I was really surprised by how great the customer service was. They tended to all my needs and when we could not figure out how to fix my problem they sent me brand new cameras to replace my old ones. Great service.
customer_reviews.author: Eli V.

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: This little Guy is spectacular in every category EXCEPT battery life. But it clearly states the size of the rechargeable battery in the listing. The app is great, the picture quality is good along with the night vision and motion detection. It comes with two cables for charging and one is short and holds the position you bend it too which is useful. Has a handy little mount and a couple extra 3M flat mounts as well. You get a lot for how much you pay. If you’re on the fence about it I say go ahead and get it.
customer_reviews.author: ZooEdits

customer_reviews.title: Does what the big boys can't.  This camera takes motion images through glass!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good camera. All it needs is the ability to be ran continously by using a power source, and polished interface and this can replace bigger security systems that cost a lot which can't capture motion through a window. I hope the makers make a bigger version of this. This little camera even has a sdcard slot! Many of the bigger cameras do. I just blow a bunch of money on a device that can't record continously and can't record motion through a window. If an update is being made place fix the device being offline alot also.
customer_reviews.author: Timsomor

customer_reviews.title: Almost too good to be true
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to watch my dog while I'm away at work during the day. Picture quality was better than expected when switched up to "1080p". Night vision was also unexpectedly great. Connecting to the camera with the app was fairly easy, as was connecting it via wifi. Tried it out one day on my way to work and about 15 minutes after I took off it disconnected from the app. Checked it when I got home and it never seemed to work again. Not sure what happened but the headline says it all.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Intoxifaded

customer_reviews.title: Not to bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: The camera is small and easy to install. Night time visibility isn't the greatest. Picture quality could also be better. Overall, it is a decent camera. I love the feature that allows live recording and to set alarm times. It's very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: great in real time not for videos
customer_reviews.text: it works very well in real time watching for the picture and audio, but it has a very hard time playing videos on the phone, it wont play sound on the computer and sometimes looses network and cant find the videos while on the phone, very unhelpful when i need the audio for proof. it downloads videos on the phone very very slow and wont do so in the background, extremely unhelpful that audio wont work on the computer and in the settings it says chinese and no other option.
customer_reviews.author: Ixlisha

customer_reviews.title: Connection and recording problems
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera since March 2019 and I have been having a lot of trouble with it recently. It connects only occasionally and records occasionally (even when it's connected). I have it in a bedroom looking out the window and it worked perfectly for a few months, but now the connection and recording problems. It's connected to an always on USB port so no issues there. I've been in the tech business for over 14 years so I have a little experience in this industry and have tried way too many things with no avail.
customer_reviews.author: Rockinchan

customer_reviews.title: camera update
customer_reviews.text: Saw mixed reviews but gave it a try. The app lags a little but overall good camera. Read in some reviews about having it connected at all times. I connected it and works fine. For a small camera, imaging is pretty good 3 month update: Camera is also connected to the outlet so it doesn’t run out of battery. The app however says my camera is currently disconnected and cannot log me in. I powered the camera off and back on, and it was connected again for about 1 week. Currently camera is “disconnected” again. This camera would not be for long term use.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Small camera used with iPad or phone
customer_reviews.text: I like that this camera has a nice strong magnet to hold my mini camera. I also like that I can hook it to my iPad and phone. The night vision is not the best. If you want to continue to record you have to have the app open and screen on the whole time or it will disconnect. I did not like that. Also it’s better if you keep the charger plugged in. If you just want to check on the driveway or house once in a this is a alright camera.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: SD card issues
customer_reviews.text: For what I needed it for it worked great until it lost signal for about a month. Then it just magically started working again. It picks up audio pretty good. I didnt like that the battery only holds up for 1 hour. My last complaint was that nothing could read what was put onto the SD card, so I had to constantly watch and manually record everything. Other than that it was ok.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Good for something, not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I want to be able to check on my chickens in the coop without going out there. I got this camera because it doesnt have to plug in but the battery lasted maybe an hour of me trying to get it set up. Plus everytime I try to check it its offline so even though it's not that far from the router, it isn't strong enough to work consistently. Probably better suited for a short term scenario. The visual was great and even in pitch black I could see everything in the coop with the iron function. Nice wide angle view.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Flewelling

customer_reviews.title: All around useless and time waster
customer_reviews.text: Did not connect. No instructions came with the package, appeared to be used by another customer and returned as inside box was opened. Came with 1 cord, not 2. Connected to my Wi-Fi but light wouldnt flash fast green and it kept indicating it wasnt recording. What a disappointment. Checked for instructions on the product info itself and on the app, found none. Followed the prompts on the app, still didnt work.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Works well and has a great Customer Service Team
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased the previous version of the camera and it was working very well until it suddenly disconnected from network. After explaining the issue to Customer Service Team they sent me a replacement (upgraded model). The new model comes with a new application and has more precise motion detection along with upgraded infrared night vision feature. Depending on settings, it can either record everything or start recording once motion has detected.
customer_reviews.author: Spatial

customer_reviews.title: Never Connected to App/WiFi
customer_reviews.text: I spent an hour trying to connect this camera to my wifi system. The app never found the camera. I read the instructions which were clear enough. But when the instructions say something is supposed to happen and it does not, Then I repeat with a variety of interpretations, Forget it. I get frustrated. I did wait a few months because I did not have an immediate need. I expected it to work out of the box with my Fire Tablet or my Android phone. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Bookwormwood

customer_reviews.title: Pass / waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Kept dropping WiFi, unable to log on to app. Had to try multiple times with no luck. The site reads as professional reliable product but when I received the box the instructions were broken English. Just a huge waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Elenia

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME Mini camera
customer_reviews.text: I’m not very good at setting up things like this so I reached out to get support. I heard from Andy and he was so patient with me and walked me through it via email. He would not let me give up. I love the camera and the customer service is beyond what I expected. Highly recommend this camera. If you, like me have difficulty, just email for support and they will help you!
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: It's up too you
customer_reviews.text: - I couldn't get it to work with the app but was able to do a hack and access it through my computer aka not secure - price not bad - very small camera - the SD card slot didn't want to eject the micro SD - only works with 2.5G not 5G WiFi - I had issues but others didn't so up too you if you want to try this mini camera out
customer_reviews.author: Mkmg09

customer_reviews.title: Don't work for me
customer_reviews.text: So far it sucks it won't hook up to my WiFi and when it so the app don't work so I'll be back after I contact them with a update until them 👎🏾
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY FOR YOUR MONEY.
customer_reviews.text: THIS ITEMS WAS FAST DELIVERED. PICTURE QUALITY IS GREAT! AND IS VERY DISCRETE. THE ONLY NEGATIVE IS THE BATTERY DOESN'T LAST AND IT GOES OFFLINE OFTEN UNLESS... IF YOU MANAGE TO KEEP IT PLUGGED IN THE OUTLET.. IS THE ONLY WAY IT WORKS WITH OUT INTERRUPTIONS
customer_reviews.author: Yanisley

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: This spy camera is very low quality, the picture quality during the day is bad enough that I couldn't see what was going on in my living room. The night vision is worse than that. I tried placing the camer in multiple locations and the night vision distance is about 1 foot, anything beyond that is just black. The audio is very low almost to the point you cant hear anything and low quality. Also the battery in day or night mode only lasted approximately 30 minutes to 1 hour even when fully charged(showing 100% on the camera). I have returned the camera.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Junk product! Beware.
customer_reviews.text: After following the broken English instructions, and loading the required app, I finally got the camera to work. However after shutting down don't expect the camera to successfully logon again. I had to delete and reload multiple times. Its just not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: T. L. Long

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: This camera is not as described it drops offline OFTEN then needs to be reset everytime the night vision is VERY blurry and hard to make out anything. When connected to WiFi it will randomly shut off and so when away from home impossible to monitor because it has powered off. Not happy the power cord also fits VERY loose will fall out on it's own
customer_reviews.author: Picot1954

customer_reviews.title: They will not honor warranty
customer_reviews.text: I tried to contact company since it had warranty . The camera gets too hot . It started to obscure the picture . They replied to alter settings. That did nothing n it was evident they didn’t want to honor warranty I stopped using it n consider this wasted money .
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This would not stay online pain in the butt
customer_reviews.text: Would not stay online at all had to constantly redo it. That should not be an issue to deal with. I think the only thing I really liked about it was that it had a strong magnet inside of it that I could attach to anything metal. That is the best and only good thing I think about it. Get it to stay online and I would probably buy quite a few more and have the picture quality better and the motion quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Winner!! Security ➕
customer_reviews.text: We easily positioned our spy camera to see front door, walkway, and yard. It is hidden from public view with a couple screws attaching it to underneath our roof. So now with an outdoor security system in place we are safer. The video is clear and the app was easy to install and operate. This price is excellent and quality definitely exceeded our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Surfer Girl

customer_reviews.title: with a portable charger, this camera is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: this camera is absolutely amazing! it's a bit of an pain to go through the set up EVERY time I wanna use it but worth it for the quality of the videos and pictures! absolutely stunning and crystal clear! I also am in love with the versatility of this camera! magnetic and discrete and fits in any place I have tried! need to keep an eye out for any packages? you got it! need to use it as a baby monitor? nanny cam? works like a dream! I keep my portable charging block plugged into it for convenience and easier to keep discrete otherwise you are limited to where any outlets may be located.
customer_reviews.author: Kira Pond

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with device - customer service even better!
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service with prompt, helpful responses even on weekends - can use this in multiple scenarios (home, hotel, car) - only wish you didn't have to reset the device each time you move location - flexible mounting options - primary storage is on internal SD card (wish you could simultaneously record a stream to your SD card and phone). Very importantly, my original unit stopped connecting to the network after several weeks. I tried everything and so did their tech support. When this made no difference, they did not hesitate to ship out a replacement unit at no cost even though my Amazon return period had expired - awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.author: ByteMan

customer_reviews.title: For 50$ you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.text: It's kinda funky to set up. Both my phone and camera had to be on the 2.4 bandwidth. Video was jumpy at all resolutions but turning off decoding helped let me run it at 720 with smooth framerates. Don't know if this thing can run at 1080. We set this up to help us find our run away cat. I used the alarm motion detector to let us know when there was movement at the back door.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: The camera is good. And the Tech., Andy is very helpful, answer my questions and issues fast.
customer_reviews.text: The support tells me ­'For iPhone XS, the A­pp P2PLiveCam is unde­r upgrading so as an ­alternative please do­wnload the App HDMini­Cam for iPhone XS.' B­ut my phone is a Gala­xy Note 8. After seve­ral emails going back­ and forth with the s­upport. It is working­ better. I keep the c­amera connected to a ­power source. I downl­oaded the P2PLiveCam ­into my phone. Config­ured according to the­ recommendations by t­he support. I am happ­y with the product. T­he support is great. ­
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Carela

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother spend the money on a case of beer.
customer_reviews.text: I know it seems like a real good deal but it really isn’t the iOS app is horrible don’t bother get the android if you have windows 10s you’re out a luck to it’s not supported I have this thing plugged in right next to my Wi-Fi router just to check it out the longest it ever stayed on without crashing plugEd In was about six hours It’s completely undependable
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: The camera worked pretty well at first but then I had trouble connecting it remotely. It was just not connecting remotely after trying numerous things. I then contacted them via email, they responded quickly with very sincere attitude and offered their brand new version product for free which is more stable according to their test. I accepted the offer and the process was fairly painless. Now just waiting for the new camera, hopefully the new one will work with no trouble. Overall I am very satisfied with their customer service, quick response and nice attitude and did provide a solution to resolve the issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: This Unit didn't work for me maybe it'll work for you?
customer_reviews.text: This camera I couldn't make it work nor could southwest access and video company that there company deals in many diffent kinds of camera's and they too couldn't make it work. It's a boat anker rip off#!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Pruitt

customer_reviews.title: The app is wierd, would be a cool camera otherwise
customer_reviews.text: So, I purchased this to take on an international trip. I didn't need it, which is a good thing, cause I could not seem to get it to work before the trip, so I left it. I tried for days too. Anyway, I left it on my desk and forgot about it. Then a month ago, my phone was running out of storage, the reason - I found a bunch of 10-minute videos of my ceiling from this camera. Forgot I left it plugged into a wall charger.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Manley

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little camera. Everything works just as described. When you're setting this up and you don't get it right the first time, you have to find the little reset hole and use the little tool that was sent with it to reset it for another attempt. Camera works great. You might want to consider getting a power bank to power the camera if you want to have it completely detached from any other source because the battery doesn't last long but you wouldn't expect it to what as small as this camera is.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great camera in a little package
customer_reviews.text: Great software and you get a lot for the price point. Setup was easy. Just take your time getting the micro sd card in and out. Battery life is a little short but hey cant put a large battery in a little device. I am happy with my purchase. I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: 😱😱😱spooky shizzle y'all!
customer_reviews.text: I've heard the app for this may contain Malware. People have lost control and or access to their camera and phones.
customer_reviews.author: david lee

customer_reviews.title: Very short battery life
customer_reviews.text: Even with nearly no motion detection activation, the battery life in a climate controlled hallway was about 30 minutes. If constantly connected to a power source it works acceptably well. App is a little clunky, without the features found in a Zmodo or Yi camera. The size doesn't really work for concealment.
customer_reviews.author: Law Dog

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: We really needed this but it did not work. It seems bigger than the image shown and it also does not connect to the app. Even when it connects the camera doesn't work. We'll probably end up splurging for a name brand camera, this was a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Siobhanna

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: Wifi connection is great, set up was a breeze and picture quality is mush better that I expected. The only reason I only gave it four stars is that the app is running on your device 24/7. If you want to turn it off, you have to use the "FORCE STOP" feature in app settings. This works and I have had no problem with the app by doing this.
customer_reviews.author: Quickon2

customer_reviews.title: Best WiFi Camera and customer service around.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these cameras good quality camera for the price. and something else i realized is i had a issue with one of the cameras and contacted customer support and i have never been treated with such great customer service. All said and done i was sent 2 new cameras... It is totally amazing. Honestly probably the best customer service i have ever had. . If anyone is looking for a excellent wireless mini WiFi camera this is the way to go. You guys and ladies at AREBI are awesome. One thing for sure is, i would love to have all my customer service people be like Alyssa. Keep up the great work.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Burke

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Completely stoped working 24-36 hours after usingit. Both Mode and On/Off lights start blinking Blue and Green and Wong connect to WiFi , Hotspot or Anything
customer_reviews.author: Kristoffor leonard

customer_reviews.title: nothing but issues. Camera is offline all the time???
customer_reviews.text: Camera would be good if it worked. Says "wrong password" NO IT IS NOT!!! Keeps turning off, can never remote access it. Always says "offline" Waste of money. Do noit bnuy this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Colbert

customer_reviews.title: Very very good for price
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my chicken coop and it is perfect. I have power in the coop so it stays plugged in. A charged up camera only lasts an hour at best, so I have it hooked up. This is very valuable during storms. I can check on my chickens without having to be in the storm. I can also annoy my co workers by asking them repeatedly of they wanna see my girls. I like this camera so much I'm going to get another one soon. Gonna put it in the chicken run.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 15 minutes
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to get this item to work since I plugged it in to charge. It connected to my home WiFi but had no range. I’ve purchased a memory card to see if it makes a difference however I don’t have high hopes. Waste of money and time
customer_reviews.author: JTaylor

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: Connected to my home wifi but have been unsuccessful at viewing a camera image through the app -screen stays black. Unfortunately I was too busy to play with this when I had the return window (by 4 days ugh) so I am stuck with a non-functioning item. Played with it repeatedly but no luck. Do Not Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shirlsaw

customer_reviews.title: Best Body Spy or Mini CCTV Camera
customer_reviews.text: This can be used as a CCTV or a body cam. It has on board battery and doesnt need to be connected to wifi to use your phone to view. You do need to make an account but after that you can pick if you want it as a spy camera or a CCTV wifi for your home. Video quality is okay 1080p and 720p looks like 480p to me. No lag when using it as a spy cam but once you set it as a home wifi camera you get 1 or 2 second delay but you now have power bank support for hiding it anywhere. Just a side note i got this from a lighting deal.
customer_reviews.author: Natsume Konno

customer_reviews.title: I was ripped off
customer_reviews.text: I bought two cam. Paid full price for both as new however one of the box came open. That said cam has a bad quality.. images both during the night and day, the quality is very bad. I tried the other cam (which came sealed one in a plastic) and noticed that it has a much better quality and resolution is very good compared to the another one which came opened. Now that I put both side by side I have concluded that the they sent me a refurbished camera instead of a new.. this was a wicked act.. can't believe it..
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Porter Cayasso

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for .
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is pretty bad so I leave it plugged in at a higher outlet . Quality is good enough , I leave my room light on at night . Night vision isn’t great . To record you have to keep your app open at all times , which pretty much sucks . It doesn’t come with a sd card . Motion detection is good , even when sunlight hits the areas you get notified . You get what you pay for . Overall it’s useful .
customer_reviews.author: jules.v

customer_reviews.title: Biggest Scam Ever - DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product a while back, but GUESS WHAT! I tried to download the mobile application to enable the camera and the app store says that the said "application name" does not exist in the app store.... I spent nearly 50$ on NOTHING..absolutely nothing. I can't see what's on the camera at all.
customer_reviews.author: Joel M

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: My item arrived promptly and set up quite easily the picture quality is not nice. Night vision works well on the device. My only complaint is that the battery life when not plugged in is a rather short, however that is to be expected with such a small device. All in all was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Cool concept spy camera. But quality isn’t there yet
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about this camera that it works. But putting too much features in the camera really doesn’t make it much. Battery life is to really short. The Wifi range is by far the worst. But there is potential in this product. Just gotta go back to the drawing board. And work on the features you have now and perfect it. Not add more features to it. Hopefully this review catches your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Erante P.

customer_reviews.title: The product
customer_reviews.text: Everything worked perfectly. The only issue I had at the beginning was the installation on the phone . It took at lest 15 minutes to install the app register etcétera. I have unplugged it from the cord . The question I do have it’s how long can stay it with out the cable plugged to the wall ? . It is a very noticeable device . Still trying to find a place where it could be unseen.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Sleek camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is small and sleek. Love the design. I had a hard time setting it up. But thanks to the other set up reviews, I got it to work. I have several different camera in my home, and the picture quality of this camera is very good. Very clear, easy to see. I love the magnet feature. Overall happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy cause the APP doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy . I had one of these I bought a year ago that worked great . So I bought another . They changed the app 2 weeks ago and now it only works if u are home . So both of my cameras don’t work unless I’m home . Defeats the purpurse of why it was bought in the first place . .
customer_reviews.author: lsciarra

customer_reviews.title: This is a Great Mini Camera
customer_reviews.text: Now, it's not a perfect picture ... the colors tend to be washed out a bit ... but, it has tools to correct the light input and it works really well. As long as you have it connected to your home Wifi ... you can be in town and still see what's going on at home. I'm 71, computer illiterate, happy with simplicity. This is it!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy This
customer_reviews.text: This is either a defective product or a scam. I couldn’t believe the poor quality of my recordings. The colors are all wrong, especially under the fluorescent lights in the kitchen. The motions are extremely laggy. My box didn’t even have the iton sticker. The microSD slot is impossible to insert into, and it got my microSD card stuck in there, and I am unable to take it out. I will be returning this and demand a full refund, including the price for my microSD card. Worst purchase in a while.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: I am ordering a replacement since the unit will not work
customer_reviews.text: Update replacement came in works great no issues with the camera the software sometimes closes for no reason still ? The mode button does nothing as its pushed all the way in so if you need to resent it nothing happens, the application will not stay connected to the network and the application keeps closing the minute you try and do anything. I have reinstalled the application several times to try and get it to work but no luck. I will give it another try hoping that the problem is with this devise but at this point I remain hopeful but doubtful if the application keeps crashing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good little camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations. Setup was easy, app is really intuitive and works fine on IOS. It also has lots of features to control camera remotely, such as sound recording, night vision option and more. Good stuff. Image quality is decent for the camera size. Battery holds up to around 30-40 minites, but for continiouse servaliance you would need to use power outlet anyways. Magnet backing gives this camera an extra ease of setting it up on any metal surface. Had some image issues ( or so I thought) had to contact customer service. It was responsive and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Dilmurod Khikmatov

customer_reviews.title: Reliable Buddy
customer_reviews.text: I like how it is HD 1080P, has night vision and motion detection. I like that it provides 150 degree wide angle view so that I can see what is going on. I also like how tiny it is and how simple it looks. I also like how I am able to control it using an app on my smart phone. I like how it can stick to magnetic surfaces such as the fridge. I also like how it still works while it charges. Overall I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Crap!!!
customer_reviews.text: Picture is ok because i can see a person body but not clear detail Motion detector is good Now the night vision sucks!!!! Can't see anything only if light is on My major problem now is that night vision or not the picture is flickering slowly in and out hard to explain unless i post a video This item was a ok purchase had it for about a month or less now it is extremely crap no i havnt dropped it or nothing I've installed it easily as said it was working good until now never touched it since I've installed it I want my money back!!! You get what you paid for
customer_reviews.author: Dre

customer_reviews.title: Expensive product that disappoints with poor quality video and no night vision
customer_reviews.text: At first, I liked the appearance and initial video quality. However, the video quality seemed to deteriorate from natural colors to a pinkish/reddish look. No night vision makes the camera totally useless in the dark, except for its infrared glow.
customer_reviews.author: Winstorm

customer_reviews.title: It had been a long time but I needed some help.
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased the AREBI wifi camera in June of 2019 but was never able to figure it out completely. So on July 5, 2020, I emailed the AREBI customer service team about my issue and was contacted by Alyssa. Alyssa asked a few questions regarding the unit then determined that a new unit should be sent out at no additional cost. A new unit was at my front door by July 13 and completely functioning with a matter of minutes. I went into the adventure with nothing to lose, just hoping for a little help. What I got was a great experience with Alyssa and the AREBi Team, I'm a customer for life. Tim C.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Corbin

product_meta.title: AREBI Spy Camera Wireless Hidden WiFi Mini Camera HD 1080P Portable Home Security Cameras Covert Nanny Cam Small Indoor Outdoor Video Recorder Motion Activated Night Vision A10 Plus [2020 Version]
feature_bullets: AREBI WIFI SPY CAMERA OF THE LATEST 2020 VERSION: AREBI A10 PLUS 2020 Version is the LATEST model with the NEW app HIDVCAM, Built-in Magnet, 150° Wide Angle and 1080P Live Video. The NEW app HIDVCAM is more steady & secure. No QR Code on the camera. A10 Plus is designed and manufactured by AREBI. EACH of AREBI A10 Plus comes with a unique ANTI-FAKE QR code on the package. Just please use your phone to scan it to verify! Please report to us if no ANTI-FAKE QR code found. BE AWARE of the FAKE!

EXCELLENT LIVE STREAM NANNY CAM: Just download the NEW app HIDVCAM for your iPhone or Android phone and have it configured with router Wi-Fi (Only 2.4GHz). Now you are ready to view LIVE video on the App remotely from ANYWHERE in the world. Keep an eye on your home or office as a nanny camera. With the internal magnet, the hidden camera can be adsorbed on any iron surfaces. Perfect as surveillance camera in: Office, Home and Car etc.

ALL IN ONE MINI CAMERA: Although the camera is quite small, it comes with all useful features you need for a Wifi Mini camera: 150° Wide Angle, Built-in Magnet, 1080P Live Video, Motion Activated Push Alerts, No-Glow IR Night Vision, Recording while Charging, Playback/Snapshot/Record Remotely, iOS and Android Compatible, Live Stream from Anywhere, SD Card Recording, Free App, One App Multiple Camera, One Camera Multiple Users and More.

RECORDING WHILE CHARGING SPY CAMERA: This AREBI mini spy camera comes with built-in high quality 300mAh rechargeable lithium-ion battery which can last about one hour. Besides, you can plug it to a 10000mAh battery pack to record up to 30 hours. Or you can get the camera plugged to USB charger to have it stay on continuously. You’ll have peace of mind knowing that you can watch over your valuables by live stream at any time.

MOTION DETECTION AND NIGHT VISION: With the upgraded intelligent motion detection, now you can set the sensor sensitivity manually. Once a motion is detected, the hidden camera will send Push Notification with images to your phone. You can log into the App to see what’s going on in real time and never worry about missing something important. The device features covert design of 6 infrared IR lights with non-luminance and 5M night vision distance. You can remotely switch it on/off on the App.
